EmailTemplate.name: Decoding CFR - Webinar Content.Send Email 6 - Thank you.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks! Here’s Your Webinar Replay
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thanks for attending our recent webinar on Self-Checkout Best Practices where you learned about:
- Factors to consider while you evaluate adding or expanding self-service in your store - Planning a successful pilot project - Success beyond the pilot store
If you have questions or want to learn more about NCR’s Self-Checkout options that may be a great fit for you, just contact us <[[https://www.ncr.com/contact-us]]> and we’ll give you a call back to see how we can help.
No risk, no hard sell—just good information.
Missed the webinar? Listen to the replay here <[[https://ncr.webex.com/recordingservice/sites/ncr/recording/11ed2078df52441f914c3965ad6010a9/playback]]>.
